Html:
All,

Oxite looks like a great project. I'd like to use it but I don't want to shell out another $10 a month for db services with my hosting provider. Any plans for an xml store?

Cheers,

Rana
No plans, sorry.  It shouldn't be too hard (depending on your skill level) to implement your own provider though.  Contribute the code to Oxite as another provider?  :)

Did you ever get this idea of the ground?

I got part of the way on this and would be interested in comparing notes, code and ideas.

You can download my code and read some of my thoughts on the subject here:

http://www.hexadecimal.se/2009/05/03/ImplementingAnXMLDataProviderForOxitePartI.aspx

Hope to hear from you!

hexadecimal,

Nice! I haven't done anything for an xml store and won't have the time either... Busy with other projects. I'm really pleased to see you have some code for it :) Cheers!
Fame and fortune awaits you, hexadecimal, if you can finish it!  Ok, no fortune, but definitely fame.  :)

Half-way there!

IPageRepository, caching, thread-safty and some minor refactoring left.

http://www.hexadecimal.se/2009/06/13/ImplementingAnXMLDataProviderForOxitePartII.aspx
